title-group.article-title: Computer Aided Engineering for the Design of Flight Control and Hydraulic Systems

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1997 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: A Computer Aided Engineering (CAE) tool has been developed for the design of flight control and hydraulic systems. The CAE tool consists of independent modules that build on each others results. For the programing of each of these modules it was necessary to thoroughly review the state-of-the-art. This paper presents a structured design procedure for hydraulic systems of transport category aircraft aiming at maximum performance at minimum weight (and cost). Reference is made to CAE modules written to support a substantial part of this design procedure. The module for the steady state calculation of hydraulic systems is further detailed.
